name: Visual Effects Assessment
description: Evaluation criteria for visual effects, including animation .
author: the-zinny team

criteria.name: Artistry
criteria.description: The artistic quality, creativity, or aesthetic integration of visuals.

criteria.name: Technical Achievement
criteria.description: The innovation and use of new or improved technology.

criteria.name: Overall Fidelity
criteria.description: The overall realism and believability of the VFX.

criteria.name: Necessity of VFX
criteria.description: The importance of visual effects in conveying the story, or overall success.

criteria.name: Contribution to Narrative
criteria.description: The overall contribution of VFX to the film's narrative.
